resources.string: You need to allow the application to access the activity monitoring so that it can detect and analyze your trips.
The application uses your phone\'s activity monitoring to detect and analyze your trips. It can\'t work if you don\'t allow the application to access activity monitoring.
The application requires your intervention to adapt the settings of your phone. In order for the app to record your trips, you need to follow the directions below.

The automatic deletion of authorizations function is enabled. Please change this setting to ensure that the application runs normally. To do this, go to \"Permissions\" and uncheck \"Remove permission if app isnt\'t used\" at the bottom of the screen.
Automatic deletion of permissions is disabled. If you enable this feature, the application will no longer be able to record your trips automatically.
Background task is allowed. The application uses the GPS sensor only driving. It has been optimized to avoid battery drain.
The Bluetooth sensor on your phone is off. Your trips will not be analyzed if the Bluetooth badge is not detected.
The Bluetooth is activated. This enables the BEACON to be recognized and identified. This makes it easier to identify your trips and know which vehicle you are driving.

Hello,

 I'm having difficulty with the %s application and I want to be called back.

If the application does not work after following the recommendations above, you can contact us by email. It\'s fast and the email will contain all the necessary information to analyze the origin of your problem.
The app does not record your trips?
The geolocation of your phone is disabled. The application can not work if it cannot access this information.
You have enabled geolocation. The location sensor (GPS) measures the vehicle\'s speed and heading. If it is disabled the application can not work.
You must allow the application to access the precise location of the phone so that it can analyze your routes. In the \"Location\" settings, activate \"Precise Location\".
To detect and analyze your trips, the application must be able to access the phone\'s location.
To detect and analyze your trips, the application must be able to access the phone\'s precise location.

You must allow the app to access the phone\'s location for it to detect and scan your trips. In the phone settings, three options are available: (1) never, (2) when the app is active and (3) always. It is essential to select option (3) always otherwise, the application will not work.

You must allow the application to access the phone\'s position so that it can detect and analyze your routes. In the phone settings, four options are available: (1) never, (2) ask next time, (3) while using the app and (4) always. It is necessary to select option (4) always otherwise the application will not work.
The application uses the location of your phone to detect and analyze your trips. It can not work if you do not allow the app to access the location.

Mobile data is not enabled. This will not block the trip detection and trip recording. On the other hand, mobile data is essential for analyzing the data of your trip. If mobile data is disabled, the trip will not be lost but trip results will be displayed only after reconnecting to a mobile network.

Mobile data is enabled. The connection to a mobile network is required to analyze the data at the end of your trip. The app can detect and save your trip without accessing mobile data. However, the trip analysis will be performed only if your phone is connected to a mobile network.
To be notified that a trip is being scanned, you must allow the app to display notifications.

The application displays notifications to inform you when a trip is in progress or is complete. If you do not allow the app to display notifications, you will never be notified when a trip is being saved.
The settings of your phone are good and the sensors necessary for the analysis of your trips are activated.
If the app does not record your trips, we invite you to disable the energy saver of your %1$s phone using the guide available via %2$s.
If the app does not record your trips, we invite you to disable the energy saver of your phone using the guide available via %s.
If the app does not record your trips, we invite you to disable the energy saver of your iPhone using the guide available via %s.
How do I disable energy saver?
The app is not authorized to access phone activity. This may limit the trip recording.
The app is not allowed to run in the background. This may limit the trip recording.
Trip recording is not possible because the app is not authorized to access the Bluetooth sensor.
Trip recording is not possible because the Bluetooth sensor is turned off.
Trip recording is not possible because the app is not authorized to access the phone\'s location.
Trip recording is not possible because the Location sensor is turned off.
Several problems are blocking the trip recording.
Trip recording is not possible because the app is not authorized to access the Bluetooth sensor.
To enjoy automatic recording of your trips, the application must access the phone\'s position. To do this, select \"Always\" in the phone settings by following the steps below
To benefit from the automatic recording of your trips, the application must access the exact phone location. To do this, follow the steps below.

You must allow the app to access the phone's location for it to detect and scan your trips.

In the phone settings, three options are available:
(1) Never
(2) While Using the App
(3) Always

It is essential to select option (3) Always, otherwise, the application will not work.
The application must be allowed to access the phone\'s location to detect and analyze your trips when it is running in background.
The application must be allowed to access the phone\'s position to detect and analyze your trips.
The application must be allowed to access the phone\'s precise location to detect and analyze your trips.
To do this, choose the \"While using the app\" option after pressing the button below.
To do this, choose the options \"Precise\" and \"While using the app\" after pressing the button below.
To do this, choose \"Allow all the time\" when the next popup is displayed.
To do this, choose \"Allow\" when the next popup is displayed.
In order to enjoy the automatic recording of your trips, the application must access the phone location when it is running in background.
To do this, press the \"open the settings\" button and select the %s option in the phone settings.
To recognize your vehicle and analyze your trips, you must activate the detection of nearby devices.
To do this, choose the \"Allow\" option after pressing the button below.
To be informed when a trip is analyzed and receive tips, you must allow the application to display notifications.
To do this, select the \"Allow\" option after tapping the button below.
To improve the analysis of your trips and identify the mode of transport used, you must activate the option Motion & Fitness on your phone.
To improve the analysis of your trips and identify the mode of transport used, you must allow the application to access the phone activity.
To avoid the application being stopped by the phone\'s battery saving system, you must accept background task.
The application uses the GPS sensor only while driving. It has been optimized to avoid battery drain.
